com.salimov.yurii.controller.authorization

Class ForgotUserInformationController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.salimov.yurii.controller.authorization.ForgotUserInformationController

  • @Controller
 @ComponentScan(basePackages="com.salimov.yurii.service")
public class ForgotUserInformationController
extends java.lang.Object
    The class implements a set of methods for forgot password.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Yurii Salimov (yuriy.alex.salimov@gmail.com)
    See Also:
    CaptchaService, CompanyService, UserService, SenderService

        private void searchInMainCompanyAndSend(java.lang.String email)
                                 throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException,
                                        java.lang.NullPointerException
        Seeking a default user by equals email from main company email and sends information about him to e-mail.
        Parameters:
        email - a user email for whom to remind information.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - Throw exception when parameter login is blank.
        java.lang.NullPointerException - Throws exception if user is absent.
